definition: Cai E (1882-1916), originator of the National protection army of 1915

sentences.english: The author elaborated the historical function of Cai E in promoting militarism education in this study.
sentences.chinese: 本文闡述了蔡鍔在呼喚軍國民教育中所起的歷史作用。

sentences.english: In Guilin, Cai E wanted him to paint the troops, he was not from.
sentences.chinese: 在桂林，蔡鍔要他教部隊士兵作畫，他也不從。
